Question: Moxin (Huzhou) Tech. Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Moxin (Huzhou) Tech. Co., Ltd.

Product: KOKONI SOTA 3D Printer

- Upside-Down design for stability and speed
- Maximum printing speed of 600mm/s and acceleration of 21,000mm/s^2
- AI-powered 3D modeling software and real-time monitoring
- Multi-color and multi-material printing with seven-color synchronous printing and support for seven printing materials
- No assembly or manual bed leveling required, WiFi connectivity, and AI-intelligent features
- Various models available with different specifications and prices, starting from $449
- Shipment starting in mid-August, free standard shipping to select countries

For more information, visit https://sota-3d.kokoni3d.com/
Summary_cn:
摩信（湖州）科技有限公司。

产品：KOKONI SOTA 3D 打印机

- 倒置设计，稳定性和速度兼具
- 最大打印速度为 600mm/s，加速度为 21,000mm/s^2
- 基于人工智能的 3D 建模软件和实时监控
- 多色多材料打印，支持七色同步打印和七种打印材料
- 无需组装或手动调平床面，支持 WiFi 连接和人工智能功能
- 提供不同规格和价格的各种型号，价格从449美元起
- 产品将于八月中旬开始发货，对指定国家提供免费标准运输

欲了解更多信息，请访问 https://sota-3d.kokoni3d.com/
